cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 4 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Enjoy a comfortable stay in your own private space inside the dorm with our pod beds! Own curtain, light, usb port, power plug, locker and fresh linens provided.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Enjoy a comfortable stay in your own private space inside the dorm with our pod beds! Own curtain, light, USB port, power plug, under bed storage and fresh linens provided plus mink blanket to keep you warm.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Enjoy your own space in our modern twin room which comes with full linen, towels, TV with DVD player as well as tea & coffee making facilities. Please note the kitchen & bathrooms are shared.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 7th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 7th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
